profile_positions.description:
Supporting new site ramp up project by establishing ground rules of operation, such as but not limited to:
•	Resource planning (HC and equipment as well)
•	Monitoring HC attendance, new recruitments, trainings and replacements if required
•	Provide on the floor guidance, instructions and advice for the newly arrived IDL personnel (Shift Leader, Planner,…)
•	Introduce morning operation (sunrise) meeting internal for partner company
•	Daily production targets, with output monitoring on hourly basis
•	Establishing daily, quick operations key user meeting between Huawei and partner company
•	Establishing weekly forecast meeting
•	Serve as communication bridge between Huawei and partner company where required, on all relevant areas (planning, production, inbound, outbound, quality)
•	Take active part in new facility layout discussions and design
•	Providing constructive suggestions and take actions to prepare for peak period (from HC, equipment, storage space optimization/increase point of view)
•	Coordinate, check and follow up on Purchase request process
profile_positions.title: Site Manager

profile_positions.description:
Leading contact and communication bridge not just between Huawei Site team and Partner (DHL) but also internally between other HW departments as well (Planning, Logistics,…)
-  Providing operational and overall leadership of the Site, with quality and delivery orientation and End customer satisfaction (Quality First mindset) in major focus (On time Loading, ZERO backlog, On time Production, , production LT,…)
-	Introduce daily operation meeting between Huawei On-site support team and partner company
-	Implement weekly forecast meeting with partner and follow up on the actions needed to be done in order to meet upcoming period (2-3 month) demand and challenges.
-	Take actions and solving Urgent requests and demands
-	Collect, evaluate and publish customer/partner QBRs and initiate Assessment meetings
-	Responsible for customer or other department requested/suggested special process developments & improvement projects (outbound LT improvement, cross dock solution,…)
-	Reporting to ESC Manufacturing Director
-	Responsible for customer satisfaction and Site quality performance, with ZERO customer claim mindset. 
-	Coordinate with other Huawei colleagues and sub-departments (quality, planning, engineering) in problem resolving actions and implementation of those actions
-	Participates or take lead in Site major visits from Customer, Government or Huawei internal high level visitors
-	Take part on annual ISO audits
-	Coordinate activities to support half year and annual wall to wall, inventory stock take. Take actions and implement them, depending on stock take results.
-	Participate in yearly budget preparation for overall Manufacturing department.
profile_positions.title: Site Manager

profile_positions.description:
-	Maintain the daily/weekly communication with customer representatives
-  Operational leadership on the program, with profit orientation and customer satisfaction in major focus (OTD, highest quality level, production LT,…)
-	Driving internal process developments, monitoring of product line supply chain and production, taking part in capacity planning
-	Take active part on customer QBRs and Assessment meetings
-	Responsible for customer spec. process development & improvement projects
-	Reporting to Business Unit Manager
-	Reviews program proposal or plan to determine time frame, funding requirements, procedures for accomplishing program, staffing requirements and allotment of available resources to various phases of program.
-	Responsible for customer satisfaction and feedback collection and reviews and corrective actions. 
-	Establishes work plan and staffing for each phase of program, and arranges for recruitment or assignment of customer focus team personnel with the functional leader.
-	Confers with Customer Focus Team (CFT) to outline work plan and to assign duties, responsibilities and scope of authority.
-	Directs and coordinates activities of CFT and required support areas to ensure program progresses on schedule and within prescribed budget.
-	Prepares program reports and presentations for management, client or others.
-	Confers with CFT to provide technical advice to resolve problems.
-	Coordinates program activities with activities of government regulatory or other governmental agencies.
-	Participates in Profit and Loss (P&L) analysis, responsible for tracking relevant metrics and drive action items based on results.
